data.text: @_nhlsharks I had mine slightly over a month ago and has total body muscle aches, chills and fatigue
@_nhlsharks Super tired and a little achy but otherwise NADA.
@_nhlsharks 101 fever and achy about 12 hours later
@beccaronee @k8malloy SOLIDARITY I LIKE IT
@k8malloy @_nhlsharks I’m also getting it tomorrow so if we go down, we go down together 😅
@_nhlsharks I just had a sore arm. Lots of water and the more you move your arm the btter
Thank you everyone for your responses! I’m a little bit of a worry wart but I’m hoping I’ll be fine! I will update all of you after 🤗
@_nhlsharks I just got mine today and so far, not too bad, sore arm and I’m feeling a bit tired
@_nhlsharks I got my 2nd on Saturday afternoon. Yesterday I had chills and aches. Little bit of chest pain and sore throat. Took 2 500mg Tylenol’s last night. Felt great today
@_nhlsharks My mother-in-law was wiped out for 48 hours but my aunt and cousin didn’t experience anything. Totally depends on the person.
@_nhlsharks I had my second dose of Maderna and just like the first the only issue I had was a slightly sore arm for a couple of days. YOU GOT THIS!
@_nhlsharks My mom and dad had no side effects
@_nhlsharks my friend said it was like having all the benefits of a hangover without drinking the night before
@_nhlsharks I was tired that night and a sore arm for a few days
@_nhlsharks I had flu-type symptoms starting during the night and continuing most of next day sweats, chills, fever, etc).  Hubby had no symptoms.   Don’t worry.
@_nhlsharks When I got the second shot I felt tired the next day
@_nhlsharks I had my first Friday. Felt achy and tired. My brother-in-law had his 2nd shot a couple weeks ago with no reaction. I know someone else who their 2nd shot and the same thing, no reaction.
@_nhlsharks I got my second Pfizer shot yesterday. Felt tired right afterwards, had a hot flash earlier today. Otherwise, nothing.

@_nhlsharks My sister got aches and slight fever about 30 hours after Pfizer dose two but that's it. 
My dad had absolutely none after.
@_nhlsharks Normally not much headache injection site Soreness , if you did well Ion first shot I would assume you will have  no problems
@_nhlsharks I was really tired for the rest of the day but that was the only side effect
@_nhlsharks It officially knocked my mom on her butt. You and I at least will be going through the symptoms together
@_nhlsharks Sore arm and a headache. That was it. Have some Tylenol ready to go tomorrow night and Wednesday and you’ll be fine.
@_nhlsharks I got it and I was completely fine. My coworker was very tired the next day but that was it
@_nhlsharks https://t.co/mFkAHvFXul

@_nhlsharks I only had minimal arm soreness for the 2nd dose. Though I took a tylenol about an hour after receiving the shot just to get ahead of any potential funny business. Any side effects should be minimal and only last a couple days. By the weekend you should be perfectly fine! 👍🏻
@_nhlsharks I was fine except for a little arm soreness! Nothing worse than the first time. I actually think it was better the second time around.

@_nhlsharks My sister is an ICU nurse and she said you get mild side effects but should be similar to mild Covid symptoms she got a low fever and body aches . She told me the more hydrated you stay the less your symptoms will be.
@_nhlsharks i had a sore arm and was a little achy overall. it was about the same as the 1st dose for me
@_nhlsharks Minimal side effects. Able to work and do normal routine.
@TaillonEra OF COURSE
@_nhlsharks Ya I got the moderna one and felt like crap but the residents at my work had minimal symptoms so it seems like younger people have it worse
@umkenzie Yeah I’ve heard the aches and the fever a lot! Okay thank you 🤗
@smileyfacehertl Okay that I can totally deal with
@TaillonEra I’ve heard older people have lesser symptoms after the second dose so that would make sense!

@_nhlsharks I got mine this past friday in the morning. All day I was fine then around 5 pm I started to feel achey and freezing. And then it progressed into whole body aches and a 101 fever. I felt like shit the whole next day in bed. But then on sunday I was fine!
@_nhlsharks My sister had a sore arm, fever, and headache that lasted till about 24-48 hours
@_nhlsharks I was completely fine the 2nd dose of Pfizer, no symptoms at all (granted I had COVID in October) so that could have played into it
@_nhlsharks my best friend had a headache & body aches the whole next day!! but that’s about it. It was gone by the 2-3rd day
@_nhlsharks My mom got it and was fine but her coworkers had fevers, headaches, body aches, and nausea
